slides.title: Angle Basics
slides.body: Angles measure rotation between two rays. Units: degrees (°).

slides.title: Complementary & Supplementary
slides.body: Complementary sum to 90°. Supplementary sum to 180°.

slides.title: Vertical Angles
slides.body: When two lines cross, opposite angles are equal.

slides.title: Triangle Angle Sum
slides.body: Angles in a triangle sum to 180°. Use this to find missing angles.

questions.explain: 120° is greater than 90° and less than 180° → obtuse.
